original_title: Will to Win: Syracuse Basketball's Unlikely Rise from Underdogs to National Champs
overview: A groundbreaking syracuse.com documentary featuring never-before-seen, behind-the-scenes accounts from every scholarship player and coach of the 2003 NCAA championship team, including Carmelo Anthony, Gerry McNamara and Jim Boeheim. The film is packed with fresh and revealing interviews from the players and coaches involved in the most unforgettable period in SU basketball history - one that united an entire community. The documentary, presented OneGroup, marks the 20th anniversary of the group that rose from being unranked in the preseason to claim the programâ€™s first national championship during the 2003 NCAA Tournament.
title: Will to Win: Syracuse Basketball's Unlikely Rise from Underdogs to National Champs
